author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two boys, aged 14 and 17, went missing in the Cauvery river here after they ventured into it for bathing here on Friday.

The two along with three more boys ventured into the river at Chinthamani bathing ghat in the evening when they went missing.

Acting on information, a team of fire fighters carried out a search in the water. However, they could not trace the two boys. Fire fighters gave the names of the boys as Dharshan and Gyaneswaran.
title: Two boys go missing in Cauvery river
